label: HandlePersonality
m: How can I describe me? In a word, eclectic.
There is my analytical self (I’m a computer scientist, after all). I’m reasonable, logical, assertive and dedicated.
Then we have my creative side, which makes me curious, intuitive, different and friendly.
I take data-driven technical and business decision...
...while I trust my instinct and empathy when it comes to colleagues and end-users.
I run on challenges, rather than coffee. And value meaning, rather than money.
